content:
{
  "name": "eslint-plugin-rewrite-imports",
  "version": "0.0.3",
  "description": "Eslint plugin for rewriting imports based on regex pattern or paths in tsconfig.json",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest",
    "doc": "eslint-doc-generator",
    "build": "ts-node ./build.ts",
    "start": "nodemon --config nodemon.json",
    "prepublish": "npm run doc && npm run build"
  },
  "main": "dist/plugin.js",
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "Yu Li",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {},
  "homepage": "https://github.com/yuliswe/eslint-plugin-rewrite-imports",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/eslint": "^8.56.3",
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.12",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^7.0.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^7.0.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/rule-tester": "^7.0.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/types": "^7.0.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/utils": "^7.0.2",
    "esbuild": "^0.20.1",
    "eslint": "^8.57.0",
    "eslint-doc-generator": "^1.6.2",
    "eslint-plugin-jest": "^27.9.0",
    "eslint-plugin-unused-imports": "^3.1.0",
    "get-tsconfig": "^4.7.2",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "json5": "^2.2.3",
    "nodemon": "^3.1.0",
    "prettier": "^3.2.5",
    "ts-jest": "^29.1.2",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.2",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3"
  },
  "files": [
    "README.md",
    "package.json",
    "package-lock.json",
    "dist"
  ],
  "private": false,
  "peerDependencies": {
    "eslint": ">=8.0.0"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/yuliswe/eslint-plugin-rewrite-imports"
  }
}
